entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:10 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 03:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Humidity: 91 %

Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to periods of snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
